  • Classes in com.vaadin.polymer.iron.widget.event used by com.vaadin.polymer.iron.widget.event 
    Class and Description
    ErrorEvent
    Fired when an error is received.
    ErrorEventHandler 
    IronActivateEvent
    Fired when iron-selector is activated (selected or deselected).
    It is fired before the selected items are changed.
    Cancel the event to abort selection.
    IronActivateEventHandler 
    IronChangeEvent
    Fired when the checked state changes.
    IronChangeEventHandler 
    IronDeselectEvent
    Fired when an item is deselected
    IronDeselectEventHandler 
    IronDocViewerComponentSelectedEvent
    Broadcast when another component is clicked on
    IronDocViewerComponentSelectedEventHandler 
    IronFormElementRegisterEvent
    Fired when the element is added to an iron-form.
    IronFormElementRegisterEventHandler 
    IronFormElementUnregisterEvent
    Fired when the element is removed from an iron-form.
    IronFormElementUnregisterEventHandler 
    IronFormErrorEvent
    Fired after the form is submitted and an error is received.
    IronFormErrorEventHandler 
    IronFormInvalidEvent
    Fired if the form cannot be submitted because it’s invalid.
    IronFormInvalidEventHandler 
    IronFormPresubmitEvent
    Fired before the form is submitted.
    IronFormPresubmitEventHandler 
    IronFormResetEvent
    Fired after the form is reset.
    IronFormResetEventHandler 
    IronFormResponseEvent
    Fired after the form is submitted and a response is received.
    IronFormResponseEventHandler 
    IronFormSubmitEvent
    Fired after the form is submitted.
    IronFormSubmitEventHandler 
    IronInputValidateEvent
    The iron-input-validate event is fired whenever validate() is called.
    IronInputValidateEventHandler 
    IronItemsChangedEvent
    Fired when the list of selectable items changes (e.g., items are
    added or removed).
    IronItemsChangedEventHandler 
    IronLocalstorageLoadEmptyEvent
    Fired when loaded value does not exist.
    Event handler can be used to initialize default value.
    IronLocalstorageLoadEmptyEventHandler 
    IronLocalstorageLoadEvent
    Fired when value loads from localStorage.
    IronLocalstorageLoadEventHandler 
    IronOverlayCanceledEvent
    Fired when the overlay is canceled, but before it is closed.
    IronOverlayCanceledEventHandler 
    IronOverlayClosedEvent
    Fired after the overlay closes.
    IronOverlayClosedEventHandler 
    IronOverlayOpenedEvent
    Fired after the overlay opens.
    IronOverlayOpenedEventHandler 
    IronResizeEvent
    Fired when the splitter is dragged.
    IronResizeEventHandler 
    IronSelectEvent
    Fired when an item is selected
    IronSelectEventHandler 
    IronSwipeEvent
    Fired when a child element is swiped away.
    IronSwipeEventHandler 
    KeysPressedEvent 
    KeysPressedEventHandler 
    LowerThresholdEvent
    Fires when the lower threshold has been reached.
    LowerThresholdEventHandler 
    RequestEvent
    Fired when a request is sent.
    RequestEventHandler 
    ResponseEvent
    Fired when a response is received.
    ResponseEventHandler 
    UpperThresholdEvent
    Fires when the upper threshold has been reached.
    UpperThresholdEventHandler
